Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, excellent service”
Reviews.Author: Camll
Reviews.Content: returned spent five days hotel dikker thijs however feel little let booked hotel based reviews read trip advisor hotel nice definately four stars would rate three stars busy street overlooking canal reception small decor found tired worn room second floor canal older part building bit walk room steps led room well room large spacious comfortable room cleaned every day clean towels etc requested double bed booking however two singles put together bathroom nice powerful shower watch hot water hotel busy street noise level staff freindly polite willing assist breakfast standard ate breakfast many places eat close attractions walking distance jump trams 125 takes old city would stay

Reviews.Title: “Service. Staff. Location. What else?”
Reviews.Author: Adrian J
Reviews.Content: stayed last trip liked fine pay much higher rates location dikker thijs block leidesplein big plus rates much included breakfast hotel included free ticket either van gogh rijksmuseum choice decided try glad requested nonsmoking room high floor overlooking canal usual couldnt guarantee would try said high floor canal nonsmoking room would look elsewhere wouldnt guarantee two email nice reservations promised block nonsmoking room also got great top floor except penthouse big id asked single balcony great view rooftops canals one dutch friend came checked impressed whats catch youre wondering theres one wasnt air conditioned understand rooms one wasnt nights cool kept door balcony open fine also tall fan room turned pointed away bed dont like blowing breakfast plentiful good didnt vary 3 nights didnt matter staff courteous old fashioned hotel want key turned whenever leave hotel problem prompt wakeup call calling taxi last morning complaints hotel would stay although dead summer id want air conditioned room room view

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel, good location”
Reviews.Author: ka5284
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel june 16 3 nights location great easy find took train airport onto tram right outside hotel door found hotel clean staff helpful well trams entertainment right outside door heard outside noise slept like baby breakfast good plenty food rooms ac worth call email arrive try request ac room husband loved amsterdam hotel picked hotels trip based reviews dissapointed highly recommended

Reviews.Title: “good hotel with free internet”
Reviews.Author: oraldina
Reviews.Content: spent 4 hot days dutch capital hot nothing red light district arrived 11pm journey airport centraal station train platform located right schipol 1 way ticket amsterdam cost got taxi driver outside centraal charged us hotel charged us 5 mins journey compare hotel ride back centraal journey home booked via hotel warned courteous staff reception tidy spacious ensuite room tv coffee making facilities amsterdam hotels apparently first morning found shower head broken leaking everywhere oh go thought problem reception staff fixed time returned midday breakfast fine usual croissants rolls cheese juices tea coffee fantastic location tram 1 2 5 prinsengracht dam square tram stops right opposite hotel downside tram noises 6am daily fantastic location also nightlife cafe bars restaurants leidseplein 2 mins foot hotel spoilt choice italian chinese indonesian indian greek eateries burger king also must perfect spot chill local heineken beer downside location street noise partying heading home bed 4am great location museum quarter rijksmuseum handy want see rembrandt hurry van gogh museum 5 mins walking distance went stroll vondelpark well say least even like rubbish tip problem dam square well citys gone strike im surprised queen hadnt complained nearby hot hectic couple days city head beaten quieter streets oasis calm one final tip pack good pair beware right way

Reviews.Title: “A very good centrally located hotel”
Reviews.Author: Bavaria34
Reviews.Content: staff barberini hotel fantastic cant say enough service numerous special requests always came traveled trip 4 us friends mom accidentally dropped drain night leaving course pressed get airport reported situation expected would never see staff back us type service sets hotel far apart others hope return way location breakfast fantastic

Reviews.Title: “No 24 hours service”
Reviews.Author: Okyfb
Reviews.Content: arrived late accommodated room quite small adequate however next day moved larger room nice start staff helpful kind fact really made time hotel pleasure hotel also convenient walked everywhere yet walking distance also rome particularly quiet place far enough away major attractions could sleep dont quite understand people complain room sizes didnt go rome look inside hotel room important perhaps get life get one thing know im going bit wife would like thank staff make memorable trip go back possible stay barberini 1010 room march 2012

Reviews.Title: “Do not trust this hotel”
Reviews.Author: Glen A
Reviews.Content: enjoyed stay centrally located could walk everywhere even vatican city free internet extensive breakfast buffet much food long days sightseeing breakfast included rate ideal room clean bathroom updated receptionist really helpful recommended restaurant next door good value good stay

Reviews.Title: “Stay for the breakfast room alone!”
Reviews.Author: cmd123
Reviews.Content: good hotel close di trevi lucky pay 100 euro single room prices may even 300 euro depending period go breakfast american breakfast takes place indoor terrace excellent view rome breakfast included room price internet free room clean good heating winter bathroom excellent minibar little bit overpriced 7 euro small bottle arrived asked drink something bar even though seemed open receptionist told closed use room minibar course expensive also spa underground 50 meters overall positive

Reviews.Title: “Good, but not great”
Reviews.Author: Gailb772
Reviews.Content: well located great breakfast room rooms clean bit small

Reviews.Title: “Rome vacation”
Reviews.Author: dandiham
Reviews.Content: terrific location near station easy walk trevi vatican forum staff friendly helpful rooms gracious comfortable nice view st peters window views 6th dining room breakfast extensive attentive staff would stay without

Reviews.Title: “Disappointed in this hotel”
Reviews.Author: kiwipacker
Reviews.Content: unfortunate experience staying hotel august 2011 travel agent booked hotel email front desk book online reservation system big mistake hotel took opportunity book much higher rate double rate quoted email onto reservation system staff played travel agent said understand english better yet receive email travel agent event advised credit card company could email hotel travel agent lesson learned ensure rate agreed upon time check avoid hotel could even remember hotel like given bad experience travel agent also advised clients avoid hotel taken extra step warning travel across canada hope bad costs hotel lot extra euros us

Reviews.Title: “Just average”
Reviews.Author: DianaNewYorkNY
Reviews.Content: returned rome stayed barberini hotel satisfied room clean shower small us wi fi worked well top desk husband couldnt get behind bed close however one cant everything big city want pay doesnt go far better room paris elevator essential staff helpful

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyable Stay at the Barberini”
Reviews.Author: izzipip
Reviews.Content: booked feb 2011 arrival october told error booking picked morning gracious transferred us sister hotel free offered free drink palace fabulous recommend whole experience spoilt first impression special birthday celebration fell bit flat arrived barberini friends disappointing experience cleanliness bathroom toilet particular brown bowl yet cleaning hotel quiet wanted drink fabulous terrace barrestaurant noone kindly sent serve us drinks extremely friendly customer service felt way isnt obviously something happens often would say money better hotels better locations

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, nice rooms, friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: TEDPALUC
Reviews.Content: beautiful hotel center rome close everything including metro subway buses trains room large italian restaurant 6th floor gorgeous view city breakfast good wireless internet work room go downstairs lobby area receive connection seem everyone problem

Reviews.Title: “Great Value!”
Reviews.Author: Jonathan P
Reviews.Content: booked 4 night hotel reading reviews form trip advisor thought roof top breakfast room would fresh air closed airconditioned room first impression bit grubby lift dirty needed dirty marks stairs around light switches needed good clean first room stayed 4 nights view palace small bed hard staff unfriendly warm welcoming hoped however great young man helpful good english seemed know needed know sadly wasnt always duty hotel expensive thought 4 star meant staff would quite good english often couldnt understand asking returned prepaid one night left italy room felt like holding airconditioning unit outside window noisy view run exterior wall meter 2 away

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel in an amazing city”
Reviews.Author: velissarios1
Reviews.Content: stayed barberini hotel nine years ago absolutely decided stay recent visit rome three friends couldnt disappointed lovely hotel tired worn carpets stairs threadbare furniture lobby due thorough cleaning rooftop bar advertised hotel exist despite hotel staff telling us open daily breakfast nice wait staff breakfast room attentive room greatest one guest party assigned handicapped room without prior another room overlooked interior courtyard restaurant food smells dont ask staff restaurant recommendations send next door mediocre meal

Reviews.Title: “nice hotel, good, location”
Reviews.Author: bellagio_10
Reviews.Content: returned 3 night break rome staying hotel barberini hotel excellent location within 5 mins walk spanish steps trevi fountain also took us approx 45 mins walk vatican 2025 minutes walk fact good location never got whilst sight seeing hotel clean room little small side view didnt matter us hardly room reception staff attentive arrival room ready breakfast room delight 6th floor impressive views used jacuzzi one one day didnt realise would get charged 15 euros well worth legs feet would also like mention small jazz barrestaurant main street turn left reach barberini square left hand side called something like small jazz band night really enjoyable overpriced like places went

Reviews.Title: “Great location, somewhat overpriced”
Reviews.Author: CobbKappa
Reviews.Content: hotel well located near subway bus stops rooms clean comfortable made mistake reservation first night put wife two separated single rooms moved us nice couple room day frustrating staff tried make best offered us spa asked change dinner although dont serve dinner arranged nice wine different kinds bread cheese ham salad etc

Reviews.Title: “I wouldn't stay anywhere else”
Reviews.Author: michelle190725
Reviews.Content: returned first stay rome got married stayed hotel barberini staff extremely helpful could done us rooms excellent lovely view rome top floor restaurant location wise hotel brilliant close major sites short ride weather fantastic much see would recommend hotel highly extra charge use sauna steam rooms however aware prior booking

Reviews.Title: “Great location, walking distance to most highlights!”
Reviews.Author: Tunika
Reviews.Content: great breakfast 6th needed public value money

Reviews.Title: “great hotel for a family”
Reviews.Author: DrRad_11
Reviews.Content: met expectations exceeded marble floors reception area quality throughout professional service rooms well fitted comfortable bed nice bathroom breakfast room top floor terrific rome hotel able walk anywhere great gelato store corner barberini square nearby market restaurants via veneto within easy reach wed go back

Reviews.Title: “style”
Reviews.Author: remydoyle
Reviews.Content: booked hotel surprise husbands birthday arrived reception team remembered booking info provided within 5 mins room arranged bottle champagne delivered lovely reception helpful breakfast staff friendly location ideal close metro within easy walking distance many attractions would highly recommend clean friendly hotel would hesitation staying recommending friends

Reviews.Title: “Nice enough”
Reviews.Author: ostaragirl
Reviews.Content: location good walking attractions taking metro using bus system breakfast good nice rooftop dining area room adequate size italy marco p front desk helpful kind downside thought overpriced accommodations location great deal research rome hotels settled hotel barberini using tripadvisor seeing hotels location cost hotel expensive

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Stay”
Reviews.Author: Qtrhorses
Reviews.Content: best thing hotel doubt location lies within walking distance trevi fountain spanish steps colosseum otherwise hotel nice clean typical italian style rooms breakfast adequate selection bread cheese cereals sweets fruits note arrived 10 oclock one day time gone quite disappointing since breakfast 11 oclock said waiters breakfast hall professional view great breakfast served 6th receptionist service polite apart one person lack breakfast foods small minuses otherwise really nice stay

Reviews.Title: “superb location, wonderful breakfast in rooftop setting”
Reviews.Author: ame21
Reviews.Content: stayed sept 2010 3 nights hotel nice placed room way small even accomodate luggage unacceptable apparently least one room like floor unlucky enough get nightmare 2 people asked moved next day moved us standard room much bigger really lovely put us room beginning would impressed rooftop room breakfast lovely great views got wifi access main spa never seemed got impression may going time wonder ever dont know one reasons booked hotel spa location walking distance places major plus staff organised taxi airport us end 3 night stay prompt helpful overall long get standard room cupboard room spa working would really good place stay low rating gave place due spa working tiny unacceptable room given first night good enough

Reviews.Title: “Exceeded all expectations”
Reviews.Author: Westportbarbara
Reviews.Content: cute hotel room great view basilica rooftop breakfast good little late made breakfast us street trevi fountain hop bus street central museum right street worth money staff nice accomodating

Reviews.Title: “Great location and very good service”
Reviews.Author: Traveling_Fiend_007
Reviews.Content: arriving 10pm night get room greeted computer broke let room considering booked back january found hard believe think must got offer better price night taken taxi another hotel actually turned much plush barberini next day given room back start holiday surface hotel ok clean enough although minimal cleaning rooms change sheets breakfast ok

Reviews.Title: “truly 4 star hotel that meets all our needs”
Reviews.Author: georgeau
Reviews.Content: stayed jr suite two teenagers king bed single sofa bed single room bathroom lovely clean room large enough four us breakfast wonderful wait staff pleasant helpful location sight seeing excellent highly recommend

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely delightful hotel with great breakfast views”
Reviews.Author: awolkiwis
Reviews.Content: everything could wished city break love walk around location key disappointed five minutes metro ten minutes trevi fountain spanish steps supplied map wandered around seeing many sights could reception helpful staff couldnt enough made rooftop bar 6pm drink eating wonderful atmosphere seeing rome lit lovely choice restaurants around area weather april beautiful rome busy busy able get around gelato find table coffee whenever wanted lovely break definitely go back barberini hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great Value and Amazing Location!”
Reviews.Author: BluePacDog
Reviews.Content: despite rome great stay hotel service professional friendly accommodating rooms smallish like real european hotels beautifully laid decorated want hotel makes feel like staying place nice home delicious breakfast quiet rooms sparkling clean lovely really nice long flight say oh yeah

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Hotel in Rome”
Reviews.Author: Kellew1
Reviews.Content: wife stayed 4 nights end july 2010 centrally located service good located near stop easy get around via subway walking main pedestrian breakfast european style good every day room clean issues bed room small expected dont come rome sit hotel room would come back price right

Reviews.Title: “Great overall, but ....”
Reviews.Author: critique007
Reviews.Content: hotel situated piazza barberini mass transit station taxi stand nearby walk trevi fountain gallery borghese piazza navona away crowds spanish steps hotel staff group young friendly attitude helpful hotel restaurant many services breakfast good rooms good condition bathrooms clean fits needs took taxi airport 40 euros law

Reviews.Title: “Promises too much, provides very little”
Reviews.Author: exptheworld
Reviews.Content: spent three nights hotel guest italian made arrangements thrilled place staff desk excellent fluent english spoke english even though italian friendly knowledgeable helpful every way hotel smallish rooms smallish elegant clean two single rooms totally adequate since mostly bathroom roomy nicely done used laptop room time tv cannot say satisfactory bed firm good quality slept well quiet inside room rooftop breakfast room beautiful views city buffet adequate three mornings could trying lots delicious things contrary others said see rudeness breakfast room staff seemed genuinely eager help us would stay heartbeat cannot comment value since pay see bill

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable hotel, excellent breakfast and wonderful staff.”
Reviews.Author: JaneEJohnson
Reviews.Content: delightful boutique hotel via close blocks de trevi spanish steps piazza barberini one fabulous fountains block away close metro restaurants best shopping staff friendly quite helpful room fairly small american standards european perfect rome say good size marble bath tubshower sink toilet bidet room french doors opening onto small balcony 5th floor view pantheon basilica balcony comfortable bed mini bar tv even 1 2 english channels breakfast served buffet style roof enclosed glass room splendid view rooftops rome st peters breakfast ample wide selection italian well american standards like eggs bacon hotel perfectly situated opinion walked every possible corner rome never took cab great way explore city terrific stay certainly return saving

Reviews.Title: “A great little hotel.”
Reviews.Author: Raspich
Reviews.Content: absolutely delighted hotel lovely position quieter setting short walk places interest bedrooms suitable size beautifully decorated bathroom clean everything would expect roof terrace restaurant continental breakfast served gorgeous terrific views across rooftops rome would definately stay thoroughly recommend

Reviews.Title: “excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: NISOZ
Reviews.Content: rooms small side surprising considering rome bathtub sufficient screen entire bathroom wet showering booked tour vatican booked concierge accommodating informed us could go breakfast early starts 7am would late tour upon arriving breakfast refused service breakfast room waiter arrogant forget attitude whatever problem deserve treatment ruined day location good close trevi fountain spanish steps however climb hill luggage upon arrival

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Hotel”
Reviews.Author: AndreXenofonte
Reviews.Content: selected hotel comments tripadvisor web sites stay rooms tiny well kept tv even offer single english news included bad running food items able give room service actually make trips type kitchen 6th get water etc staff per owner hire additional people help rooms noisy although rooms higher floors given rooms 1st floor change even requested experience hotels rome would never come back place

Reviews.Title: “wouldn't recommend”
Reviews.Author: LisaM624
Reviews.Content: back 3 weeks italy started trip barberini relied tripadvisor reviews booking 7 great hotels want provide service future travelers perfect place us booked 2 rooms extremely clean comfortable staff could nicer accommodating helped us book tours called taxis gave us information needed great stay especially helpful gave us restaurant sightseeing recommendations hotel perfect family search nonsmoking individual airconditioning modern bathroom minibar room husband needs store central location wifi preferred

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel, in the historical center of Rome”
Reviews.Author: carinaBucharest
Reviews.Content: lovely hotel within easy distance lots main attractions mix arrived reception staff already organised us another hotel night okay inconvenient however upgrade result dealt cant hold staff lovely friendly nothing much effort breakfast tasty plentiful breakfast room lovely views rooms small perfectly honest different might expect london bed bigger expected comfy bathroom large clean generally pleased would definitely go back

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location!!!”
Reviews.Author: SandL11
Reviews.Content: decided going italy checked tripadvisor comments italy hotels thanks tripadvisor made reservation hotel barberini perfect choice hotel great breakfast perfect hotel staff kind helpful welcoming recommend go italy stay hotel barberini

Reviews.Title: “Elegant with a great breakfast and good location”
Reviews.Author: travelinjack3
Reviews.Content: excellent location comfortable would recommend ive hotel six nights staff incredible patient real help room large comfortable bathroom good difficulties use tv location perfect walking distance trevi fountain piazza barberini spagna stairs beside metro station barberini breakfast served sixth floor beautiful view city awesome buffet large hotel wifi lobby free internet access lobby

Reviews.Title: “The views at breakfast are worth the stay”
Reviews.Author: Northamptonmark
Reviews.Content: booked stay april asked 2 beds son got king size bed available us stay room one night changed room next 2 nights beds hard rocks rooms tiny also booked tour vatican confirmed online record promised would okay would get tour anyway next morning next morning one knew anything get someone come get us last minute got tour late gave sons laundry said would night next morning called next morning said couldnt till evening fit got 2 hours charged 72 euros basket fruit one guy desk nice us recommended best restaurant went italy sorry forgot name seemed really care hotels one good thing

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic hotel- will definitely return”
Reviews.Author: MarylandTriprater
Reviews.Content: reccomend hotel everyone wants stay near important rome good conditions accomodation hotel quiet windows closed even open noise big hotel faces street anyway noise common thing every capital hotel clean breakfast good top building see important part rome

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, perfect location”
Reviews.Author: deboravh
Reviews.Content: husband stayed 5 nights may 18 may 23 second part honeymoon absolutely loved hotel location could better close metro took twice walk everywhere restaurants trevi fountain spanish steps places rome beautiful city regardless always something see hotel clean staff wonderful give restaurant recommendations also show best routes get attractions roof top terrace amazing city yes vatican breakfast great get scrambled eggs bacon sausage cereal bread croissants yogurts etc plenty selection service great rooms small big enough accomodate luggages like really like rooms felt italian two things didnt like found bed hard wasnt confortable thats opinion though husband liked many people prefer hard bed also free wifi hotel use roof top terrace lobby free wifi rooms laptop provide proper room facing street didnt problems noise really impressed hotel service highly recommend would think twice staying

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: Det44
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 days end april 2010 end week italy location nice close trevi fountain spanish steps easy walking distance pantheon piazza navona plus places rooms plush elegant bathroom nice bit mildew tiles stated others view breakfast grand breakfast nice coffee good places stay italy would gladly stay even though didnt personal service feel smaller places trip also right across street small museum fantastic art pieces

Reviews.Title: “Very good if you dont like your belongings”
Reviews.Author: hatleye
Reviews.Content: pleasant small hotel within 2 minutes barberini metro line spanish steps trevi fountain etc central giving perfect location rome holiday staff friendly breakfast served top floor 6th floor amazing views roof tops rome see vatican number loved breakfast views breakfast nice although dont fooled american breakfast made scrambled egg hot dog sausage sometimes bacon rest general typical continental breakfast coffee great service excellent although buffet style drink evening restaurant hotel must recently renovated looks clean smart rooms big never european cities pleasant noisy street light sleeper take ear plugs internet access free evenings slow non

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, great location”
Reviews.Author: asiahopper
Reviews.Content: husband stayed hotel barberini four nights beginning march 2010 trip rome arrived hotel informed suitcase lost airline immediately took information offered call airline every hours order make sure got us suitcase soon possible even called room update us bag found delivered next day front desk staff helpful luggage also restaurant recommendations directions different sights etc really made us feel home room pretty small impeccably decorated authentic italian style extremely clean bathroom good size towel heater water floor shower warm room opened windows balcony though comfortable night breakfast wonderful room 6th floor amazing view loved see every morning location hotel fantastic minutes walk trevi fountain felt safe walking around area night able walk almost areas city love taking long walks also block away metro people would rather take metro overall amazing time rome hotel barberini perfect hotel us

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic!”
Reviews.Author: Hawaii_Haole
Reviews.Content: fantastic beautiful room modern bathroom steps trevi fountain main city great breakfast free cable internet room cable provided would stay

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel, small rooms”
Reviews.Author: sean_e78
Reviews.Content: initially overpriced hotel close much needed solution well priced service accomodating even free reservations next hotel breakfast generous room spacious extremely well presented across road interesting former fantastic ceiling near many tourist attractions close metro station walking distance many places interest real negative appear many good restaurants nearby needed go spanish find definitely return mentioned friends already

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Comfortable”
Reviews.Author: CJFromNYC
Reviews.Content: come back week rome organised travellers via email needed special help advice elderly wheelchair whilst rome wheelchair friendly hotel barberini specifically cater hotel staff could done organised cars airport wheelchair hire especially us rooms high standard overall service found 100 hotel restaurant needs many doorstep good varied hot cold breakfast available rooftop breakfast room superb views rome hot limited scrambled egg rather bacon sausages location 3 mins walk trevi fountain 10 15 mins attractions st peters 15 euro cab ride hotel little expensive overall quality hotel bar prices never saw anyone buying alcohol bar room snacks day limited also expensive eat would stay definitely time left first name terms staff felt like family

Reviews.Title: “small room, great balcony”
Reviews.Author: atlfamilyof5
Reviews.Content: back lovely romantic honeymoon rome stayed 4 nights barberini upon arrival greeted champagne showed room bigger expected thought hotel rooms rome would small fine location great near metro line 8 minute walk trevi fountain near bus stop join many sight seeing tours etc lovely restaurants walking distance hotel id highly recommend barberini anyone staying rome

Reviews.Title: “Lovely accomodations”
Reviews.Author: rosey57a
Reviews.Content: youre going stay rome stay hotel barberini booked 2 rooms 5 people 2 nights cant say enough great service fantastic location hotel rooms arent huge europe lot larger expected comfortable well appointed booked directly hotel communication excellent us confirmation within minutes arrival rooms ready us even though arrived late morning breakfast wonderful fine selection much could want views breakfast room wonderful wanted get tickets bus front desk reached tickets us purchase easy location close trevi fountain easy walking distance everything else get go anywhere right around corner hard rock cafe street wonderful english pub many restaurants area dine right quaint little streets return rome definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Weekend Break”
Reviews.Author: boyleinthebag
Reviews.Content: really nice hotel clean comfortable nice staff breakfast really nice staff pleasant downside size room

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience, Wonderful Staff”
Reviews.Author: susandeb
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel barberini june two nights arrived rome 9am upon getting cab hotel two children attempted believe hear caught hand front pocket old daughter trying arm got money bellman came left careful allowed checkin early hour room compact clean overlooked small courtyard nice rooftop restaurant amazing view rome decent breakfast drinks bathroom modern small stall shower linens toiletries excellent lobby small pretty hotel well located many sights including via veneto definitely recommend place short medium stay rome

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: Spencer10
Reviews.Content: wife recently got married spent honeymoon europe spent last three days nights rome italy wife rome past wanted stay near trevi fountain spanish steps found hotel barberini internet liked location hotel fact rated four star hotel wife booked three nights hotel barberini looked forward ending honeymoon rome checked hotel barberini informed upgraded junior suite instead standard room already warned hotel rooms europe expensive small united states standards got room found nice great third last night hotel came back room late afternoon told hotel clerk moved us standard room along belongings without prior knowledge hotel clerk hotel clerks attitude lucky upgraded first place explained would satisfied original room going go room remove personal belongings without prior knowledge also explained clerk could accepted room change told point room change never even given apology one complain felt wrong wanted others know hotel treats customers would recommend hotel barberini rome anyone

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel , Great Staff”
Reviews.Author: rentiu
Reviews.Content: husband spent 4 days hotel barberini part honeymoon lovely place staff decor 8 hour flight greeted basket fruit room room clean inroom safe request evening front desk staff made dinner reservations hotel within walking distance spanish steps trevi fountain made easy begin rome minute arrived would definitely stay hotel barberini next time travel rome

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Location”
Reviews.Author: jason_L_D
Reviews.Content: booked hotel arranged flights birthday weekend avoid problems arrival contacted hotel 10pm night travelling taxi fiumicino barberini organised great driver 60 euros pick us treated history rome journey great reception hotel although air conditioning wasnt working didnt small well good lots hot cold bar bit get higher star rating loads good around anyway hotel well positioned within easy reach spanish steps trevi also close easy get back fiumicino via metro definately return would ask room 405 lot bigger great weekend fantastic meal low prices da piazza near piazza navona local romans go

Reviews.Title: “We're coming back here!”
Reviews.Author: QueenMimi
Reviews.Content: hotel barberini truly lovely experience small hotel located rome within walking distance many attractions across street barberini old time charm happy room staff extremely polite helpful breakfast included room rooftop terrace wonderful way start day lots choices restaurants immediate area left barberini check another hotel meet friends find reservation barberini staff kind caring enough take us back one night find equivalent accomodations another hotel stay would definitely stay without second thought

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic!”
Reviews.Author: mikestravels
Reviews.Content: 8 couples going cruise needed hotel stay day cruise day left home end cruise travelled together quite fussy like treated arrived warmly welcomed front desk even though arrived 100 pm afternoon rooms ready us clean inviting rooms little different smaller larger overall lovely small boutique hotel enjoyed breakfast top floor beautiful window view rome breakfast great hotel located near spanish steps great location walk anywhere enjoyed stay hotel found staff helpful accommodating night return rome departing home little disappointing hot airconditioning broken rooms however staff worked hard get working order time returned dinner would hesitate stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “A gem in a central location with perfect service”
Reviews.Author: anonymous1140
Reviews.Content: wife bad stay hotel start looking around another hotel move happened hotel one block away walked hotel impressed kind polite staff front desk person front desk even show us one empty rooms say moved hotel right away able enjoy rest stay rome rooms spacious rome quiet clean also inroom tell caring place toward guests last day made arrangements front desk take us airport 400 morning got downstairs took seat lobby front desk person came us asked us need coffee went upstairs bar closed hour got us coffees van time promised well would highly recommend hotel others

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location”
Reviews.Author: ellise
Reviews.Content: tripadvisor wife recently stayed barberini hotel three nights must admit spending hours internet looking endless reviews made right choice choosing hotel first location important rome literally 5min walk trevi fountain short walk spanish steps hotel nice clean good quality throughout although room small side bathroom shower bath really problem staff excellent times friendly especially breakfast staff terrace served us breakfast good although going drink quite expensive views terrace beautiful quite recommend highly hotel cannot wait go back

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel, Great Location, Friendly Staff”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: arrived early morning room ready man desk said room ready would worth wait upgrading us suite getting ready leave hotel told manager said much work would get upgrade told going day would glad wait said regular room ready would assigned taken nice somewhat small room nice bathroom needless say disappointed would said anything would much happier downside entire experience certainly didnt let spoil overall impression hotel location hotel great walked everything however sometimes would tired take cab cab drivers little difficulty finding hotel little side street make sure know landmarks help get get major corner walk last block street via restaurant recommended thoroughly enjoyed called hostel half block away another time ate lunch cafeteria two blocks away via tourists good extremely reasonable also recommended view breakfast fantastic waiters friendly always accomodating certainly enough selection everyone find things eat filling breakfast lobby welcoming enter hotel staff courteous helpful going back rome april definitely staying barberini hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good location, good rooms, fair value”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: returned three nights hotel late find many thanks previous reviewers help picking hotel room size great room 405 much bigger think average room size request found hard book could find availability websites stumbled across think got last room close major attractions accept vatican 5 mins walk trevi 10 mins safe area would highly recommend little bar round corner called think walk hill turn right opening bar met loads people world chatting beer prices rome drinks expensive food bad wandered around bit cost hotel expensive compared cities seemed case hotels considered barberini means expensive rome delighted gem hotel highly recommended

Reviews.Title: “ok for the money”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: loved hotel complaint didnt get longer stay booked first night trip 30th birthday actually woke birthday lovely view room breakfast rooftop flights cancelled meant arrived late missed half day night tired went straight bed room nice quiet lovely bathroom area welcoming clean breakfast room treat great selection food highly recommend hotel abit pricy next hotel stayed honest money would worth paying extra comfort location excellent

Reviews.Title: “barberini - great!”
Reviews.Author: BelfastTraveller80
Reviews.Content: returned 3 days hotel second trip rome 2 able make ciampino airport hotel barberini max 45 euros take white cab outside airport otherwise get ripped intend using taxis around rome take white cabs hotel less 5 min walk piazza barberini plenty found hotel ideally placed walking trevi fountain beware pickpockets pantheon spanish steps within mins taxi vatican costs max 10 euros within 40 min walk main shopping area via del corso 5 mins walk hotel modern clean staff fairly rooms small side expected italian hotels party 4 stayed suite bathroom spacious jacuzzi bath rooms clean area could improved upon menu breakfast average buffet style cold meats cheese cakes cooked breakfast left lot desired traditional toast french toast packet however view breakfast room spectacular room service menu poor lacking variety easier walk 2 mins buy snack purpose trip special celebration although known hotel complimentary gift would recommend hotel subject healthy

Reviews.Title: “We were really pleased with the Barberini”
Reviews.Author: Silver traveller from Cornwall
Reviews.Content: even arriving hotel barberini confirmation hand stay could get us room first night rome hotel offered solution husband could sleep pull sofa room traveling companions sorry hotel solution took staff hour find another hotel room side town agreed pay room price difference cab fare disappointment anything offered also general manager extremely unprofessional speak said agree speak husband resolve issue hey mr hotel barberini general manager pick floor hotel clean good location hotel fair warning seeking room confirmation also booked hotel happened hotel giving type credit inconvenience response happen customer service

Reviews.Title: “Great Value”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: barberini average hotel like barberini location walking distance spanish steps trevi fountain via de corso metro 24 hour internet cafe staff also accomodating friendly rooms mentioned standard european sized hotel rooms two twin beds however bathroom huge took room size problem lack air air conditioning operating breakfast roof top terrace lovely views city including st peters great restaurant street room rates wish dollar much better
